text: Istinno, v ustroystve nebes i zemli, v smene nochi i dnya; v korablyakh, perevozyashchikh po moryu poleznoye lyudyam; v vode, kotoruyu nizvodit Bog s neba i ozhivlyayet yeyu zemlyu posle yeyo omertveniya; vo vsekh zhivotnykh, kakiye rasselyal On po ney; v dvizhenii vetrov i oblakov, prinuzhdennykh nosit'sya mezhdu nebom i zemloyu, yest' znameniya dlya lyudey rassuditel'nykh
